summary: Settings restore fix, import validation, version update system
whatsNew: 🔔 Automatic version update notices — ClinBridge now checks once per day and shows a banner when a newer version is available
📋 What's New modal — tap the banner to see exactly what changed and fixed, with a step-by-step guided update flow for both browser and Home Screen users
🔍 Check for Updates — new button in Settings to manually check any time
📅 Day-of-week scheduling — set any event to fire only on specific days (e.g. Sunday-only weekly backup reminder)
💾 Backup Now event action — one tap from a notification saves your full backup file instantly without closing the notification
🔄 Backup and Sync split — 'Backup Data Now' and 'Sync to Another Device' are now two separate notification action buttons
📋 All Notes — View every note across all dates newest-first, with event category filtering and edit/delete for all dates
🫁 Condition-aware symptoms — Cardiac Cough and CHF-specific symptoms auto-appear when CHF, Heart Failure, or Diastolic Dysfunction are in your diagnoses
⚠️ Save as Missed button on notifications — dismiss an alert and keep the event visible on the main page to complete in order
🎯 Activity timing confirmation — Before/After buttons now show a green banner confirming which timing was saved
fixes: beta 2: loadSettings() and loadMedicineList() were missing from startup sequence — settings, medicines, and events never loaded from localStorage after a reload (introduced when Version Check System was added in beta 1)

Settings not restoring after data import — loadSettings now uses a full deep merge restoring every saved property including fluidIncrement, weightUnit, weightAlertThreshold, customActivities, and any future fields
iOS double-reload after import — version key is now pre-set before reload so the version-check code does not trigger a second hard reload on top of the import reload
Import now validates the file is a real ClinBridge backup before writing to localStorage
All Notes 'View All' button was disappearing when Today/History toggle was tapped — fixed header update to use innerHTML preserving the button
Doctor's Report medication adherence — now excludes as-needed (PRN) meds; only regularly-scheduled medications count
Activity timing Before/After buttons — added checkmark, solid color fill, and green confirmation message
Updated date on main page header corrected to Feb 26, 2026
